Object.Name: IPSO Barometer
Object.Description1: Description: This IPSO object should be used with an air pressure sensor to report a barometer measurement. It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the barometer sensor. An example measurement unit is kPa (ucum:kPa).

Item.Name: Sensor Value
Item.Description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

Item.Name: Min Measured Value
Item.Description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Item.Name: Max Measured Value
Item.Description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Item.Name: Min Range Value
Item.Description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

Item.Name: Max Range Value
Item.Description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

Item.Name: Sensor Units
Item.Description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.

Item.Name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
Item.Description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value
